text: nanna janangadavare, nanu nim'medege bandiruva, allahana dutanembudannu aritiddu niveke nannannu hinsisuttiruviri? Endu musa tam'ma janangadavarodane kelidaru. Avaru (musara janangadavaru) vakra bud'dhi toridaga allahanu avara manas'sugalannu vakragolisibittanu. Allahanu avidheyarige saridariyannu torisuvudilla
